item.title: Igniter Prototype
item.author: hbddallen@gmail.com (David Allen)
item.description: Time I finally posted something :D I haven’t gotten as much done as I’d hoped, but I have managed to hack together design a prototype igniter to test out some systems and get a feel for everything. I figure I’d start with the igniter as it would be the simplest (and safest) system to prototype, and there’s actually flames involved! Reasoning So why did I choose to do the igniter first?
item.dc:creator: David Allen
